Equations.Allow_SuperCapital_Production: (Variable_Self.CreditsUnnormalized >= 40000) * ( Variable_Self.HasStructure {Parameter_Type = "NR_Star_Base_4"} * (Variable_Self.TechLevel >= 2) + Variable_Self.HasStructure {Parameter_Type = "Remnant_Star_Base_4"} * ((Variable_Self.TechLevel == 1) + (Variable_Self.TechLevel >= 4)) + Variable_Self.HasStructure {Parameter_Type = "Delvardus_Star_Base_4", Parameter_Type = "Teradoc_Star_Base_4", Parameter_Type = "Pentastar_Star_Base_4", Parameter_Type = "Zsinj_Star_Base_4" } )
Equations.Is_Good_Invasion_Target: 50.0 * (Variable_Target.EnemyForce.HasGroundForce == 0.0) * (Variable_Target.EnemyForce.HasSpaceForce == 0.0) + 5.0 * Function_Is_Neglected_By_My_Opponent_Space.Evaluate + 5.0 * Function_Is_Neglected_By_My_Opponent_Ground.Evaluate + 8.0 * Function_GenericPlanetValue.Evaluate + 5.0 * Variable_Target.Hints.Chokepoint + 2.0 * Variable_Target.ConnectsIsolatedPlanetsByForce + Variable_Target.Markup + Variable_Target.Hints.PriorityTarget - 10.0 * (Function_Is_AI_And_Should_Be_Ignored.Evaluate) - (10.0 + 5.0 * Variable_Self.AnyCurrentThreats) * Function_Opens_New_Front.Evaluate
Equations.Need_To_Reconnect_Islands: Function_Is_Connected_To_Me.Evaluate * Variable_Target.ConnectsLargestIslands * ( Function_Is_Good_Invasion_Target.Evaluate + (10.0 * Variable_Self.WorstIslandFractionOfLargest) ) * (1.0 - Function_Should_Crush_Opponent_Planet.Evaluate) * ( (1.0 - Variable_Target.IsHumanControlled) * Game.Age > 2 + (Function_First_Attack_Allowed.Evaluate * Variable_Target.IsHumanControlled) )
Equations.Should_Crush_Opponent_Planet: Function_Is_Connected_To_Me.Evaluate * ( 1.5 * Function_Is_Good_Invasion_Target.Evaluate * Variable_Target.IsHumanControlled ) * Function_First_Attack_Allowed.Evaluate * ( Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "Rebel_Golan_Two" ,Parameter_Type = "Rebel_Golan_Two_Strategic" ,Parameter_Type = "Rebel_Golan_Three" ,Parameter_Type = "Rebel_Golan_Three_Strategic" ,Parameter_Type = "Empire_Golan_One" ,Parameter_Type = "Empire_Golan_Two" ,Parameter_Type = "Empire_Golan_Two_Strategic" ,Parameter_Type = "Empire_Golan_Three" ,Parameter_Type = "Empire_Golan_Three_Strategic" ,Parameter_Type = "Oto" ,Parameter_Type = "Visvia" ,Parameter_Type = "Validusia" ,Parameter_Type = "Empress_Station"} + Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "Ground_Ion_Cannon", Parameter_Type = "Ground_Empire_Hypervelocity_Gun", Parameter_Type = "Ground_Pentastar_Hypervelocity_Gun"} )
